text: Sayyid Amir-Hossein Ghazizadeh Hashemi (; born 14 April 1971)https://en.mehrnews.com/amp/216621/ is an Iranian conservative politician. He is one of the Vice Presidents of Iran since 2021. He represented the Mashhad and Kalat electoral district in the Parliament of Iran from 2008 to 2021. He ran for President of Iran twice, in 2021 and in 2024. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian politicians
title: Amir-Hossein Ghazizadeh Hashemi
